doctor.name: Dr. Mohammad Nazmul Abedin
doctor.specialty: Orthopedics (Bone, Joint, Arthritis, Spine) Specialist & Trauma Surgeon
doctor.workplace: National Institute of Traumatology & Orthopedic Rehabilitation
doctor.info: Dr. Mohammad Nazmul Abedin is a highly skilled Orthopedics (Bone, Joint, Arthritis, Spine) Specialist and Trauma Surgeon in Chattogram, holding MBBS from SSMC, BCS (Health), and MS in Orthopedic Surgery. He serves as a Consultant in Orthopedic Surgery at the National Institute of Traumatology & Orthopedic Rehabilitation and provides expert treatment for fractures, joint dislocations, arthritis, back pain, spinal injuries, bone deformities, and sports injuries. Dr. Abedin offers consultations at Parkview Hospital, Chittagong, located at 94/103, Katalganj Road, Panchlaish, Chattogram, every Friday from 10am to 8pm.
